verses.verse: Now <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> was straitly shut <S%H5462>up<s%> <S%H5462><s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> came <S%H935>in.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and go round <S%H5362>about<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H259>once.<s%> <S%H6471><s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of rams' <S%H3104>horns:<s%> and the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that when they make a long <S%H4900>blast<s%> with the <S%H3104>ram's<s%> <S%H7161>horn,<s%> and when ye <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7321>shout<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout;<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall fall <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H8478>flat,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall ascend <S%H5927>up<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> straight <S%H5048>before<s%> him.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Take <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H5375>let<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of rams' <S%H3104>horns<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> Pass <S%H5674>on,<s%> and <S%H5437>compass<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and let him that is <S%H2502>armed<s%> pass <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H559>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of rams' <S%H3104>horns<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets:<s%> and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> them.

And the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and the <S%H622>rearward<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> the priests going <S%H1980>on,<s%> and <S%H8628>blowing<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7321>shout,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> make any <S%H8085>noise<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H1697>word<s%> proceed <S%H3318>out<s%> of your <S%H4480>mouth,<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H559>bid<s%> you <S%H7321>shout;<s%> then shall ye <S%H7321>shout.<s%>

So the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> going <S%H5362>about<s%> it <S%H259>once:<s%> <S%H6471><s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of rams' <S%H3104>horns<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> went on <S%H1980>continually,<s%> <S%H1980><s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets:<s%> and the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them; but the <S%H622>rearward<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the priests going <S%H1980>on,<s%> and <S%H8628>blowing<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H259>once,<s%> <S%H6471><s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that they rose <S%H7925>early<s%> about the <S%H5927>dawning<s%> of the <S%H7837>day,<s%> and <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> after the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> on <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H5437>compassed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H6471>time,<s%> when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H7321>Shout;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2764>accursed,<s%> even <S%H1931>it,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are therein, to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H854>with<s%> her in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she <S%H2244>hid<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> we <S%H7971>sent.<s%>

And <S%H859>ye,<s%> in any <S%H7357>wise<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> yourselves <S%H4480>from<s%> the accursed <S%H2764>thing,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> ye make yourselves <S%H2763>accursed,<s%> when ye <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the accursed <S%H2764>thing,<s%> and <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H2764>curse,<s%> and <S%H5916>trouble<s%> it.

But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron,<s%> are <S%H6944>consecrated<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> they shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> when the priests <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets:<s%> and it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout,<s%> that the <S%H2346>wall<s%> fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H8478>flat,<s%> so that the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> straight <S%H5048>before<s%> him, and they <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And they utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> both <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H376><s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H4480>young<s%> <S%H5288><s%> and <S%H2205>old,<s%> and <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H2543>ass,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that had spied <S%H7270>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>country,<s%> Go <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H802>harlot's<s%> <S%H2181><s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> she hath, <S%H834>as<s%> ye <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto her.

And the young <S%H5288>men<s%> that were <S%H7270>spies<s%> went <S%H935>in,<s%> and brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7343>Rahab,<s%> and her <S%H1>father,<s%> and her <S%H517>mother,<s%> and her <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> she had; and they brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4940>kindred,<s%> and <S%H5117>left<s%> them <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And they <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was therein: <S%H7535>only<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> they <S%H5414>put<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2421>saved<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> alive, and her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> she had; and she <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> <S%H7130>in<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she <S%H2244>hid<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7650>adjured<s%> them at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> riseth <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3405>Jericho:<s%> he shall lay the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> thereof in his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and in his <S%H6810>youngest<s%> son shall he set <S%H5324>up<s%> the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of it.
So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua;<s%> and his <S%H8089>fame<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> noised throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>country.<s%>
